title: two beacon node can not peer when build local devnet
body:
I am trying to build a local devnet using [Ethereum Proof-of-Stake Devnet](https://docs.prylabs.network/docs/advanced/proof-of-stake-devnet#adding-prysm-peers-to-your-network.)

I have two beacon node in one machine connecting to one geth client. The two beacon node are peered using tcp port 13000 and 13001. 

The problem is that once I use a validator client to connect to a beacon node, the two beacon node are unpeered. 

Here are some detail about the port connection.

Before validator connection.

```
geth      17226            root   34u  IPv4 196827      0t0  TCP localhost:8551->localhost:55088 (ESTABLISHED)
geth      17226            root   35u  IPv4 196705      0t0  TCP localhost:8551->localhost:55072 (ESTABLISHED)
geth      17226            root   36u  IPv6 195949      0t0  TCP *:30303 (LISTEN)
geth      17226            root   37u  IPv4 194496      0t0  TCP localhost:8551->localhost:55090 (ESTABLISHED)
geth      17226            root   44u  IPv4 195951      0t0  TCP localhost:8545 (LISTEN)
geth      17226            root   45u  IPv4 195954      0t0  TCP localhost:8551 (LISTEN)
beacon-ch 17254            root    8u  IPv4 195422      0t0  TCP 144.34.190.28.16clouds.com:13000 (LISTEN)
beacon-ch 17254            root    9u  IPv4 195957      0t0  TCP localhost:4000 (LISTEN)
beacon-ch 17254            root   10u  IPv4 197818      0t0  TCP localhost:http-alt (LISTEN)
beacon-ch 17254            root   11u  IPv4 195958      0t0  TCP localhost:43342->localhost:4000 (ESTABLISHED)
beacon-ch 17254            root   12u  IPv4 194494      0t0  TCP 144.34.190.28.16clouds.com:13000->144.34.190.28.16clouds.com:13001 (ESTABLISHED)
beacon-ch 17254            root   13u  IPv4 197820      0t0  TCP localhost:4000->localhost:43342 (ESTABLISHED)
beacon-ch 17254            root   14u  IPv4 194354      0t0  TCP localhost:3500 (LISTEN)
beacon-ch 17254            root   15u  IPv6 195967      0t0  UDP *:12000
beacon-ch 17254            root   16u  IPv4 194415      0t0  TCP localhost:55072->localhost:8551 (ESTABLISHED)
beacon-ch 17304            root    8u  IPv4 196123      0t0  TCP 144.34.190.28.16clouds.com:13001 (LISTEN)
beacon-ch 17304            root    9u  IPv4 196124      0t0  TCP localhost:4001 (LISTEN)
beacon-ch 17304            root   10u  IPv4 196822      0t0  TCP localhost:8001 (LISTEN)
beacon-ch 17304            root   11u  IPv4 196824      0t0  TCP localhost:59598->localhost:4001 (ESTABLISHED)
beacon-ch 17304            root   12u  IPv4 196825      0t0  TCP localhost:4001->localhost:59598 (ESTABLISHED)
beacon-ch 17304            root   13u  IPv4 195540      0t0  TCP localhost:55088->localhost:8551 (ESTABLISHED)
beacon-ch 17304            root   14u  IPv4 197975      0t0  TCP localhost:3501 (LISTEN)
beacon-ch 17304            root   15u  IPv6 196133      0t0  UDP *:12001
beacon-ch 17304            root   16u  IPv4 196143      0t0  TCP 144.34.190.28.16clouds.com:13001->144.34.190.28.16clouds.com:13000 (ESTABLISHED)
beacon-ch 17304            root   17u  IPv4 195552      0t0  TCP localhost:55090->localhost:8551 (ESTABLISHED)
```

After validator connection.

```
geth      17226            root   34u  IPv4 196827      0t0  TCP localhost:8551->localhost:55088 (ESTABLISHED)
geth      17226            root   35u  IPv4 196705      0t0  TCP localhost:8551->localhost:55072 (ESTABLISHED)
geth      17226            root   36u  IPv6 195949      0t0  TCP *:30303 (LISTEN)
geth      17226            root   44u  IPv4 195951      0t0  TCP localhost:8545 (LISTEN)
geth      17226            root   45u  IPv4 195954      0t0  TCP localhost:8551 (LISTEN)
beacon-ch 17254            root    8u  IPv4 195422      0t0  TCP 144.34.190.28.16clouds.com:13000 (LISTEN)
beacon-ch 17254            root    9u  IPv4 195957      0t0  TCP localhost:4000 (LISTEN)
beacon-ch 17254            root   10u  IPv4 197818      0t0  TCP localhost:http-alt (LISTEN)
beacon-ch 17254            root   11u  IPv4 195958      0t0  TCP localhost:43342->localhost:4000 (ESTABLISHED)
beacon-ch 17254            root   12u  IPv4 200008      0t0  TCP localhost:4000->localhost:43370 (ESTABLISHED)
beacon-ch 17254            root   13u  IPv4 197820      0t0  TCP localhost:4000->localhost:43342 (ESTABLISHED)
beacon-ch 17254            root   14u  IPv4 194354      0t0  TCP localhost:3500 (LISTEN)
beacon-ch 17254            root   15u  IPv6 195967      0t0  UDP *:12000
beacon-ch 17254            root   16u  IPv4 194415      0t0  TCP localhost:55072->localhost:8551 (ESTABLISHED)
beacon-ch 17304            root    8u  IPv4 196123      0t0  TCP 144.34.190.28.16clouds.com:13001 (LISTEN)
beacon-ch 17304            root    9u  IPv4 196124      0t0  TCP localhost:4001 (LISTEN)
beacon-ch 17304            root   10u  IPv4 196822      0t0  TCP localhost:8001 (LISTEN)
beacon-ch 17304            root   11u  IPv4 196824      0t0  TCP localhost:59598->localhost:4001 (ESTABLISHED)
beacon-ch 17304            root   12u  IPv4 196825      0t0  TCP localhost:4001->localhost:59598 (ESTABLISHED)
beacon-ch 17304            root   13u  IPv4 195540      0t0  TCP localhost:55088->localhost:8551 (ESTABLISHED)
beacon-ch 17304            root   14u  IPv4 197975      0t0  TCP localhost:3501 (LISTEN)
beacon-ch 17304            root   15u  IPv6 196133      0t0  UDP *:12001
validator 17328            root    8u  IPv4 196466      0t0  TCP localhost:tproxy (LISTEN)
validator 17328            root    9u  IPv4 197235      0t0  TCP localhost:43370->localhost:4000 (ESTABLISHED)
```
